properties.address: Devon County Council, Crediton, Devon EX17 2AA
properties.description: Crediton Library is open five days a week and is fully accessible to all, with off-road parking, including disabled space. Aside from a wide range of fiction and non-fiction book titles, the library offers audiobooks to borrow which can all be issued using the self-service points. The library has a small study area with free Wi-Fi, including 8 public access computers, which are free to use for up to 2 hours each day, plus printing, photocopying and scanning facilities. There are a range of regular events for all ages.
properties.title: Crediton Library

properties.address: Crediton Methodist Church, Union Road, Crediton, Devon EX17 3AW
properties.title: Crediton Methodist Church

properties.address: Folklore Library and Archive, Crediton, Devon EX17 2AA
properties.description: Open for all during normal library opening hours. Also operates special events outside of normal opening hours. Details on website and social media.
